column1: Smoque BBQ////En lieu of the Super Bowl
column2: a close bud and I decided to head to Smoque and consume mass quantities of meat
column3: assuming that once the game started the typical crowds would diminish.  And hot damn we were right!  We walked in and were second in line to order.  For me
column4: there was still a competitive element to the experience even if we weren't watching the game - I am slowly making my way to all the popular BBQ joints of Chicago
column5: and eventually I will be able to claim my favorite.  Let the competition begin...
